name: interact with stuff or some shit like that
name_original: interact with stuff or some shit like that
description:
hello there this is a game where you can interact  with literally almost everything you can see! it's a pretty bad game so don't even expect too much coming from it. and it was made on RPG Maker MV, so there's your proof that it's bad... want more...? alright then:
  1. this game was made by a person called CANCES.
  2. he's dumb :)
  3. this project isn't meant to be taken seriously
there's your fucking proof now. anyway uhhhhhhhhhhhhhh enjoy ig.

btw you can be rude with me in the comments, i'd love to see it :)

btw... the images shown there, are actually from the first version of the game. i'm way too lazy to update them. (the now finished game has more things(and the endings are unlocked in a very specific way)).
